full_description:
Deepcool RF 120 B Blue LED Case Fan

Deepcool RF 120 B is a budget friendly Case Fan that is ideal for any budget gaming setup. This casing comes with a Single color LED light built within the fan. As a part of the New RF 120 series this fan has 4 single-color LED lights build into the case fan. This case fan is available at the most favorable price possible. RF 120 B is a high brightness hydro bearing case fan with build-in Blue colored LED. With the 4 ultra-bright LED lights in the body, RF120 B gives bright and clean visual experience.The 9-blade case fan balances airflow and air pressure to offer perfect compatibility with your case or the cooler. The Noise Level of this case fan is 21.9 dB. This case fan is powered in two ways, either through a 4 Pin molex connector or 3 pin motherboard connector. But be sure not to use both connectors at the same time. The overall dimension of this casing fan is 120 x 120 x 25 mm and it weights around 150 grams. The wattage range is from 1W to 5W while the average wattage is 2.88 W Deepcool RF 120 B Blue LED Case Fan offers 01 year warranty.

title: DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Casing Fan
cat_seo_title: Deepcool Casing Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Deepcool Casing Cooler at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Deepcool Casing Cooling Fan available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Casing Fan

The DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Fan combines precision engineering, elite cooling capabilities, silent operation, and outstanding durability. It is designed to deliver exceptional cooling performance. With a fan speed ranging from 500 to 1850 RPM, it provides efficient airflow of 68.99 CFM and generates a maximum air pressure of 2.19 mmAq. Operating at a low noise level of ≤28 dB(A), this fan ensures a quiet computing experience. It features a 4-pin PWM connector for flexible and precise fan speed control. Powered by a fluid dynamic bearing, the fan operates reliably at 12 VDC with a rated current of 0.12 A and power consumption of 1.44 W.

Designed with Precision

The DeepCool FK120 is a high-performance 120mm PWM fan that has been carefully constructed and tested to optimize static pressure and concentrate airflow. It excels in various mounting applications, including cooler heat sinks, radiators, and case fan configurations. The narrow frame bezel and wide fan blades contribute to increased surface area, resulting in higher cooling efficiency. With its precision design, the FK120 delivers outstanding performance for effective heat dissipation.

Elite Cooling

The DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Fan is extremely efficient and features a PWM range of up to 1850 RPM. This wide range allows for dynamic control of the fan speed, maximizing air pressure and airflow to achieve impressive cooling results. The FK120 strikes a balance between high performance and low-noise operation, providing an optimal cooling solution for demanding systems. Its ability to generate a maximum static pressure of 2.19 mmAq and a maximum airflow of 68.99 CFM ensures efficient heat transfer.

Super Silent

DeepCool FK120 PWM fan operates at remarkably low noise levels. It reaches a maximum noise level of only 28dbA, making it exceptionally silent. The fluid dynamic bearing used in the fan design enhances its overall performance and ensures reliable long-term stability. With the FK120, users can enjoy powerful cooling without compromising on quiet operation.

Outstanding Details

DeepCool FK120 PWM Fan is made from high-quality polybutylene terephthalate (PBT) material, which provides increased durability and wear resistance. The fan blades maintain high tensile strength, ensuring long-lasting performance. The DeepCool FK120 is equipped with shock-absorbing rubber pads that shield the screw mounts. These pads effectively reduce vibrations, promoting stable and quiet operation of the fan.

Buy DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Fan from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get the original DeepCool FK120 High-Performance 120mm PWM Fan From Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest DeepCool Casing Cooler to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The DeepCool FK120 120mm PWM Fan comes with a 01-year warranty.

full_description:
DeepCool FC120 Performance 120mm ARGB PWM Case Fan

The DeepCool FC120 ARGB PWM Case Fan comes with a triple 120mm ARGB PWM Case Fan. It simplifies cable management with a novel daisy-chainable cable that carries both RGB and power functions that interconnects between fans and reduces cable clutter. The fan interconnects system removes the need for a hub and makes it easy to synchronize control of PWM and RGB for up to 4 fans. The translucent fan blades are illuminated by individually controllable RGB LEDs that surround the center hub providing a traditional lighting appearance with exceptional luminosity. Additionally, the FC120 has an automatic onboard lighting effect that can be set up quickly and easily without the use of any software or specialized controller. DeepCool FC120 ARGB PWM Case Fan has exceptional cooling performance, higher static pressure, and concentrated airflow. The fan blades' surface area is boosted by the small frame bezel, which also increases efficiency.

This Deepcool RF120 FS Case Fan is optimized with 9 fan blades design. It helps to balance air flow and wind pressure, and providing strong cooling performance.

This RF120 FS Case Fan adopts a mainstream 4-pin power interface, offers continuous and effective output. The latest Deepcool RF120 FS Case Fan has 01-year warranty.

full_description:
DeepCool TF120S 120mm High-Performance Case Fan

The DeepCool TF120 Case fan is a high-performance, low-noise fan developed specifically for AIO cooler radiators. This fan's unique technology can significantly boost the radiator's cooling performance. TF120S has a 10% higher maximum air pressure and a 15% higher maximum airflow than ordinary fans. Installing TF120S can boost your radiator's performance by 10% on average. The maximum air pressure influences fan penetrating power; the maximum airflow defines fan air transmission ability; an increase in both parameters can significantly improve fan performance. This case fan features a low-noise design, with turbulator teeth located on the exhaust side of the frame, which may greatly reduce airflow noise and vibration. In addition, 8 rubber cushions are placed on the corners of the frames to absorb further vibration. The fan has an MTBF of up to 40,000 hours and employs hydro bearings. The DeepCool TF120S case fan offers a speed range of 500-1800 RPM and comes with a low-speed converter for those who prefer silent fans.
